Package alix.lucene.search

Class HiliteFormatter

java.lang.Object
org.apache.lucene.search.uhighlight.PassageFormatter
alix.lucene.search.HiliteFormatter
public class HiliteFormatter
extends PassageFormatter
Creates a formatted snippet from the top passages. This implementation strip tags from an html input.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    HiliteFormatter()
    Creates a new DefaultPassageFormatter with the default tags.
    HiliteFormatter​(java.lang.String preTag, java.lang.String postTag, java.lang.String ellipsis, boolean detag)
    Creates a new DefaultPassageFormatter with custom tags.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void detag​(java.lang.StringBuilder dest, java.lang.String html, int start, int end)
    Copy text from html(start-end) to dest, but without tags.

  • Constructor Details

    • HiliteFormatter

      public HiliteFormatter()
      Creates a new DefaultPassageFormatter with the default tags.

    • HiliteFormatter

      public HiliteFormatter​(java.lang.String preTag, java.lang.String postTag, java.lang.String ellipsis, boolean detag)
      Creates a new DefaultPassageFormatter with custom tags.
      Parameters:
      preTag - text which should appear before a highlighted term.
      postTag - text which should appear after a highlighted term.
      ellipsis - text which should be used to connect two unconnected passages.
      detag - true if html tags should be stripped

    • detag

      public static void detag​(java.lang.StringBuilder dest, java.lang.String html, int start, int end)
      Copy text from html(start-end) to dest, but without tags. cases : broken start tag> <tag> <broken end tag
      Parameters:
      dest -
      html -
      start -
      end -
